trans-unit.source: How to uninstall elastic database job tool
trans-unit.target: How to uninstall elastic database job tool

trans-unit.source: How to uninstall elastic database job tool
trans-unit.target: How to uninstall elastic database job tool

trans-unit.source: **Elastic Database jobs** components can be uninstalled using either the Portal or PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Elastic Database jobs** components can be uninstalled using either the Portal or PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall Elastic Database jobs components using the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Uninstall Elastic Database jobs components using the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the subscription that contains **Elastic Database jobs** components, namely the subscription in which Elastic Database jobs components were installed.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the subscription that contains **Elastic Database jobs** components, namely the subscription in which Elastic Database jobs components were installed.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall Elastic Database jobs components using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Uninstall Elastic Database jobs components using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Launch a Microsoft Azure PowerShell command window and navigate to the tools sub-directory under the Microsoft.Azure.SqlDatabase.Jobs.x.x.xxxx.x folder: Type cd tools
trans-unit.target: Launch a Microsoft Azure PowerShell command window and navigate to the tools sub-directory under the Microsoft.Azure.SqlDatabase.Jobs.x.x.xxxx.x folder: Type cd tools

trans-unit.source: Or simply, execute the following script, assuming default values where used on installation of the components:
trans-unit.target: Or simply, execute the following script, assuming default values where used on installation of the components:

trans-unit.source: To re-install Elastic Database jobs, see [Installing the Elastic Database job service](sql-database-elastic-jobs-service-installation.md)
trans-unit.target: To re-install Elastic Database jobs, see [Installing the Elastic Database job service](sql-database-elastic-jobs-service-installation.md)

trans-unit.source: For an overview of Elastic Database jobs, see [Elastic Database jobs overview](sql-database-elastic-jobs-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: For an overview of Elastic Database jobs, see [Elastic Database jobs overview](sql-database-elastic-jobs-overview.md).
